description: This table contains hospital account claim condition codes from the Hospital Account Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple condition codes can be stored in one hospital account, each condition code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: CONDITION_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
A condition code used for claims associated with the hospital account. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
